Marina Diamond is a collection of modern residential towers located in the vibrant Dubai Marina district, offering a range of stylish apartments with contemporary designs and high-quality finishes. The development features spacious one and two-bedroom units, each designed to provide comfort and convenience for residents. Marina Diamond offers a variety of amenities, including a swimming pool, fitness center, and landscaped gardens. Its prime location in Dubai Marina provides easy access to the waterfront, cafes, restaurants, shopping malls, and entertainment options, making it an ideal choice for those seeking a dynamic and luxurious lifestyle in one of Dubai's most sought-after neighborhoods.
The Marina Diamond Towers will be freehold residential towers with 15 or 20 floors, being built at a total cost of AED 740 million (US$ 200 million). They will be located on southern shore of the marina and collectively have 1,300 units from studios to 3-bedroom apartments.]]>

Palm Jumeirah, Dubai's iconic palm-shaped island, is a symbol of luxury and grandeur. This man-made marvel graces the Arabian Gulf with opulent beachfront properties, upscale resorts, and entertainment options.
